desc.first: My name is Patryk, I am a beginner front-end developer. I am approaching completiton my engineering studies in applied computer science at the University of Lodz. Thanks to them I have gained a broader view of the whole world of computer science.
desc.now: most. Currently I am focusing on development in the area of front-end frameworks - mainly Angular and in the future React.
desc.interest: I like to spend my time actively - for example, cycling to interesting places and taking pictures.

myrestaurant.description: A web application - restaurant aggregator providing services services: ordering food, booking tables and a combination of both.

covid.description: A web application presenting statistics on the incidence of Coronavirus worldwide.
